pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generation of Multivariate Data with Arbitrary Marginals // An implementation of a specific method for generating n-dimensional random vectors with given marginal distributions and correlation matrix. The method uses the NORTA (NORmal To Anything) approach which generates a standard normal random vector and then transforms it into a random vector with specified marginal distributions and the RA (Retrospective Approximation) algorithm which is a generic stochastic root- finding algorithm. The marginals can be continuous or discrete. See the vignette of package for more details.
